content:
Hi! I've been looking into https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/50507, linked from the Query Parallelization Tracking Issue.
I thought I'd start by trying to reproduce the mentioned crash. I've replaced .insert with .insert_same. Then I ran the whole compiler test suite and all tests passed... so I'm guessing this bug doesn't exist anymore?
Is there anything I'm doing wrong?
I don't know that it makes too much sense to look at fixing that issue, presuming you're in parallel mode, because parallel compiler is not an area of active effort right now
but if you can't reproduce it with parallel enabled we can perhaps just close
